thread.title: Blackhawks' Bling Features 355 Diamonds

author: Kyle Newport
title: Blackhawks' Bling Features 355 Diamonds
text:
Blackhawks' Bling Features 355 Diamonds Bleacher Report 6 hrs ago Kyle Newport © via @NHLBlackhawks
These rings certainly are fit for a team that has won three of the past six Stanley Cups.
AdChoices On Sunday, the Chicago Blackhawks posted pictures of their latest championship rings.
One word: incredible.
Chicago's 2014-15 Stanley Cup championship rings feature diamonds—and then some more diamonds:
Posted by Chicago Blackhawks on Sunday, October 4, 2015 On the inside of the ring, the team's road to the Cup has been included:
Posted by Chicago Blackhawks on Sunday, October 4, 2015 The Blackhawks tweeted out some quick facts about the rings:
The ring boasts 355 round, pear, marquise and custom princess-cut diamonds, set in a 14 karat white gold ring. Tops over 10.8 carats.
— Chicago Blackhawks (@NHLBlackhawks) October 5, 2015 These rings should give every player in the league a little more motivation to hoist the Cup next season.
[Chicago Blackhawks]
